column1: The service for Mrs. Massey will be held at 11a.m. Thursday
column2: June 18 at The Presbyterian Church of Fredericksburg where the family will receive friends one hour prior to the service.  Interment will be private at the family cemetery at Cool Springs Farm in Spotsylvania
column3: Virginia. A visitation will be held from 5-7 p.m. Wednesday
column4: June 17 at the home of her son
